comments.content: Both "Emballages" & "Littoral" are set in **[Metro DF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063105/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=MetroDF%20-%20Regular&fid=c110790e21cd6a88f0f5e648c5fe2aa9&fsize=60&text=Emballages&fit=1)** free font by Harold Lohner [2000]
